ing.item: Washed apple, top and core removed

directions.step:
Preheat oven to 350~.
Sprinkle the inside of the apple with the sugar and cinnamon. Place in a baking dish, with a few spoonfuls of water at the bottom. Bake until tender or 30-45 minutes.
(NOTE: this is a good one for dessert for the whole family. Adults can sprinkle nuts on top of their portions).
From "Make Your Own Baby Food" By Lorrie Scally.
